-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | MTL class instances for the CHP library
--   
--   MTL class instances for the CHP library
@package chp-mtl
@version 1.0.0


-- | Various (orphan) instances for monads from the chp and chp-plus
--   libraries for classes from the mtl library.
--   
--   There are <a>MonadIO</a> instances for:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>CHP</a></li>
--   <li><a>CHPTest</a></li>
--   <li><a>Composed</a></li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   There are <a>MonadCHP</a> instances of the form <tt>instance MonadCHP
--   m =&gt; MonadCHP (t m)</tt>, where t is one of the monad transformers:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>WriterT (lazy and strict)</li>
--   <li>StateT (lazy and strict)</li>
--   <li>RWST (lazy and strict)</li>
--   <li><a>ReaderT</a></li>
--   <li><a>ErrorT</a></li>
--   <li><a>ContT</a></li>
--   </ul>
module Control.Concurrent.CHP.MTL
instance MonadIO Composed
instance MonadIO CHPTest
instance (MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (ContT r m)
instance (MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (ReaderT r m)
instance (Error e, MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (ErrorT e m)
instance (Monoid w, MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (RWST r w s m)
instance (Monoid w, MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (RWST r w s m)
instance (MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (StateT s m)
instance (MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (StateT s m)
instance (Monoid w, MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (WriterT w m)
instance (Monoid w, MonadCHP m) => MonadCHP (WriterT w m)
instance MonadIO CHP
